nodes.text: Solem was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories and the homeworld of an unidentified species.

Solem was brutally subjugated by the Galactic Empire as a demonstration of power following the loss of the first Death Star at the Battle of Yavin. Imperial Governors Yolan and Malvander Bren ruled Solem from an Imperial stronghold in the city of G'ai Solem during the Galactic Civil War. However, Yolan realized the evils of the Empire, and left his position to join the resistance.
